description: Returns details of the update actions.

parameters.name: ServiceUpdateStatus
parameters.description: The status of the service update (string) ---

parameters.name: ServiceUpdateTimeRange
parameters.description: The range of time specified to search for service updates that are in available status StartTime (datetime) --- The start time of the time range filter EndTime (datetime) --- The end time of the time range filter.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start time of the time range filter.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end time of the time range filter.

parameters.name: UpdateActionStatus
parameters.description: The status of the update action. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional marker returned from a prior request. Use this marker for pagination of results from this operation. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: UpdateActions
nested_items.description: Returns a list of update actions.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the replication group.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateName
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the service update.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateReleaseDate
nested_items.description: The date the update is first available.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateSeverity
nested_items.description: The severity of the service update.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the service update.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateRecommendedApplyByDate
nested_items.description: The recommended date to apply the service update to ensure compliance. For information on compliance, see Self-Service Security Updates for Compliance.

nested_items.name: ServiceUpdateType
nested_items.description: Reflects the nature of the service update.

nested_items.name: UpdateActionAvailableDate
nested_items.description: The date that the service update is available to a replication group.

nested_items.name: UpdateActionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the update action.

nested_items.name: NodesUpdated
nested_items.description: The progress of the service update on the replication group.

nested_items.name: UpdateActionStatusModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the UpdateActionStatus was last modified.

nested_items.name: SlaMet
nested_items.description: If yes, all nodes in the replication group have been updated by the recommended apply-by date. If no, at least one node in the replication group have not been updated by the recommended apply-by date. If N/A, the replication group was created after the recommended apply-by date.

nested_items.name: NodeGroupUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the service update on the node group.

nested_items.name: NodeGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the node group.

nested_items.name: NodeGroupMemberUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the service update on the node group member.

nested_items.name: CacheClusterId
nested_items.description: The cache cluster ID.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeId
nested_items.description: The node ID of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The update status of the node.

nested_items.name: NodeDeletionDate
nested_items.description: The deletion date of the node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStartDate
nested_items.description: The start date of the update for a node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateEndDate
nested_items.description: The end date of the update for a node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateInitiatedBy
nested_items.description: Reflects whether the update was initiated by the customer or automatically applied.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateInitiatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the update is triggered.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStatusModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the NodeUpdateStatus was last modified.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the service update on the cache node.

nested_items.name: CacheNodeId
nested_items.description: The node ID of the cache cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The update status of the node.

nested_items.name: NodeDeletionDate
nested_items.description: The deletion date of the node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStartDate
nested_items.description: The start date of the update for a node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateEndDate
nested_items.description: The end date of the update for a node.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateInitiatedBy
nested_items.description: Reflects whether the update was initiated by the customer or automatically applied.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateInitiatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the update is triggered.

nested_items.name: NodeUpdateStatusModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the NodeUpdateStatus was last modified>

nested_items.name: EstimatedUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The estimated length of time for the update to complete.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The Elasticache engine to which the update applies. Either Valkey, Redis OSS or Memcached.
